head.description: General Settings for the nVidia Prime Monitoring Applet

refreshInterval-spinner.tooltip: Increase or decrease this spinner value to change the refresh interval - use a slow refresh if you have a slow machine

showGpuTemp.description: Show GPU Temperature as well as icon
showGpuTemp.tooltip: Available in Horizontal and Vertical Panels. Display is in Degrees Centigrade.

displayExtra.description: Access enhanced functionality through Context Menu - needs Cinnamon Restart
displayExtra.tooltip: Currently  adds glxspheres64 Graphics Processor Test - VirtualGL needs to be installed
